tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE supporters ( supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(255), last_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), location VARCHAR(255), interests TEXT, engagement_level VARCHAR(20) )

CREATE TABLE supporters (
	supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	supporter_name VARCHAR(50),
	demographics JSONB,
	interests JSONB,
	engagement_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
	comm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	supporter_id INT,
	communication_type VARCHAR(50),
	content TEXT,
	communication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE supporters_demographics (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_interests (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hobby VARCHAR(50),
    interest_category VARCHAR(50),
    level_of_interest INT
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_engagement (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_engagement_date DATE,
    number_of_engagements INT,
    preferred_communication_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_demographics (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    city VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_interests (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interest VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_engagement (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_engagement_date DATE,
    engagement_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE supporters_segmentation (
    supporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment VARCHAR
)
